Florida's #41, Sam Bennett, took a tripping penalty at 3:32. Edmonton was unable to capitalize on the power play.
Both teams have been trading scoring chances, as evidenced by the shot totals (FLA 42, EDM 46)
The last minute of play saw a hit registered against Edmonton's #25, Darnell Nurse, after an aggressive shift from Florida's forwards.
